name: peopleinfinance
tag_list: peopleinfinance, finance, people, job, bank, social-network
description: The first social network dedicated to pr
overview:
peopleinfinance is the first social network dedicated to professionals in finance.

peopleinfinance is a interconnected network for experienced professionals in finance. Peopleinfinance is exclusively dedicated to professionals from banks, corporate finance, insurance and IT in finance.

By joigning the social network, you can develop your network in your professional community and meet other professionals in finance. Thanks to peopleinfinance, you keep informed about news from your contacts and your sector. You can also participate to discussion relevant in your sector.

As a professional in finance, you can register free to the social network peopleinfinance and access to tools to develop your social network in your sector and exchange with the professional community in finance.

By getting membre of peopleinfinance, you can create your own profil and improve your visibility in your sector.
